title: "CBC Training"

The Computational Biology Core at the University of Connecticut offers a number of training opportunities. 

- A monthly [workshop series](workshopOverview.qmd). 
- Semester-long focused [reading/study groups](readingGroups.qmd). 
- Semester-long focused [training](seminars.qmd). 
- A formal [12 credit certificate program](gda.qmd).
